features: Hypoallergenic. Dermatologist Tested. Free of dyes and perfumes
Each pac of Tide Pods Free & Gentle provides a deeper clean (versus the leading Free detergent) that's gentle on skin
1 laundry pac for regular loads, 2 pacs for large loads and 3 pacs for extra large loads
Tide PODS laundry pacs dissolve quickly in hot & cold
Keep out of reach of children
body.description: Taking care of sensitive skin doesn't have to be hard. Each Tide PODS contains breakthrough 3-in-1 laundry solution with super-concentrated detergent, stain remover and color protector that is specially designed free of dyes and perfumes. Simply put in one pac for most loads, but use two pacs for large loads and three pacs for extra large loads. For a simple, worry-free laundry experience that's gentle on skin, Tide PODS Free & Gentle laundry detergent will keep your family looking and feeling great. It outperformed the leading free detergent on 10 different stains (1).Unlike many other HE detergents that can slow washers down because of too many suds, Tide HE Turbo contains quick collapsing suds and targets tough stains. So you can get amazing results without the extra rinse cycles to remove the suds.(1) under standard single-wash conditions on Polycotton fabric in a standard top-loading washer

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Save 90% of energy on every load on average just by switching from hot to cold. *When using a non-HE machine and switching all loads from hot to cold water, based on average electricity rate of (US, 13.3c/kWh) and 8 loads per week. Specially formulated for cold water conditions to keep clothing looking colorful and bright.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: I break out if I use other detergent, so this is my go to. I didn't have any reaction, it doesn't add any artificial scent to my clothes, and it gets my clothes clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I’m converted to pods
reviews.reviewText: I used to live by liquid detergent. I’m glad I finally came to my senses. The pods are convey for apartment dwellers or others who have to trek to a laundromat. I just put them in my pocket. The container had a twist to that’s easy to open. Inside is the pods. The count is high and you’ll definitely use it for months even if you did 5 loads a week. Also they are easy to use. Just drop them in the washer drum then put in the clothes. My clothes come out clean, smelling fresh and fragrance free.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pods Look Delicious
reviews.reviewText: for large loads it recommends using 3 pods, medium you use 2, and small you use 1. A little disappointing because I got the smallest size so if I did that I would blow through the amount I have right now. Honestly I just use 1 no matter the load size and it works just fine. There's no scent like advertised. I have eczema/sensitive skin and these work well to make my clothes softer. Itchy sweaters are no longer itchy! Honestly I highly recommend these pods.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Product - Expecially Like the Free & Gentle
reviews.reviewText: I've been using Tide Pods since they came out. The convenience is wonderful and I never risk overturning a box of laundry soap ;-)!!! Espcecially important if you tend to be a bit klutzy or move faster than you should!!!They have always done a fantastic job on all our laundry from undies & socks to towels - to very dirty work clothes. I use 2 for my extra large capacity loads and 1 for regular ones. I use cold water unless absolutely necessary or for whites - especially my white cotton towels and have never, I mean never, had anything come out less than perfectly clean and beautiful.I have sensitive skin, subject to itching and drying and the Free and Clear ones work great with no irritations.Highly recommend - it's worth the price - I think it cost less in the long run - using fewer pods & less water to get the job done well and saves me time - my most valuable commodity.I've never had one leak before use. They may get a bit sticky in our humidity but pop apart easily.Word of advice - I keep the container lid snapped at all times - I don't want to have to "find" the ones that fall down between or behind the washer and/or dryer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works well. Makes washing a breeze.
reviews.reviewText: Super easy to use — literally throw one pod into the washing machine, add clothes and start. Great (almost neutral) scent and no skin issues after using these. Works very well with normal loads but not as well with delicates / handwashing cycles. On these (given the lower water temperature and shorter cycle) the pod doesn’t fully dissolve and the outer surface is left as a gooey substance on clothes. For these loads I now place the pod inside a small washing bag and then clean this out afterwards. Not a big issue but something to be aware of.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No more irritated skin!
reviews.reviewText: The Tide PODS Free and Gentle Laundry Detergent Soap Pacs, available in a 112 count, HE Compatible and Coldwater Clean, are a game-changer for anyone with sensitive skin. I've transitioned exclusively to these Tide PODS because traditional laundry pods tend to irritate my skin. The impact on my daily comfort has been significant – no more irritation or itching. My skin feels calm, and my overall well-being has improved immensely. Highly recommended for those seeking a gentle yet effective laundry solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Family is very bothered by scent and it has none. Cleans good and very easy to use and store.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Work good, easy to use, unscented
Cleans very well, no odors and wonderful for sensitive skin and noses 😊

reviews.reviewTitle: Free & Gentle product which is why I buy it! Works well!
reviews.reviewText: I am satisfied with this product. It works well and is free of dyes and scent which is why I buy it!

Tide has been my brand of laundry detergent for many many years. Started off with the powder, then the liquid and tidepods once they became available. I used various kind but once there was one for sensitive skin I switched. I make sure I have alot on hand to do my laundry. Perfect for my sensitive skin. Thank you.
Works great. I bought it from here because of the low price. Otherwise I would not. Great for those that are senstive to smell. These washes out great and have no scent

reviews.reviewTitle: Tide Free is my Favourite Laundry Detergent
reviews.reviewText: I started using Tide Free and Gentle laundry detergent quite awhile ago. All of us have very sensitive skin and we have to use scent free products. This product does an excellent job of cleaning all of our laundry items.
